oryx_diagnostics::DiagnosticsCommand::Response &  response 
) [private]

Callback for handling the "node_list" command. Fills the response.data field with the same string as would result from calling DiagnosticsManager::printList

Author:
Adam Panzica
Parameters:
dataThe callback argument data (in this case, ignored)
responseThe DiagnosticsCommand::Response reference to fill with data
Returns:
TRUE if sucessful, else FALSE
